title: Intensive Online Reading Strategy Training for [Large-Scale] Adult Practitioners

context.additional_context: Enhancing social domain text analysis competencies to improve work efficiency for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more metacognitive reading strategies appropriately to efficiently analyze texts across diverse social domains.
Learners can establish and execute self-directed reading learning plans using scaffolding tools in mobile environments.
Learners can share and provide feedback on reading strategy experiences through reciprocal teaching with peer learners.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
